item.title: CVE-2024-30443|2024-03-29T17:11:36.995Z -- GS Plugins -- GS Testimonial Slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GS Plugins GS Testimonial Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GS Testimonial Slider: from n/a through 3.1.4.
